name: Curried Sweet Potato, Carrot, and Apple Soup
author: emccabe
summary: Great spicy and savory vegetarian sweet potato soup! Keeps well, and the flavors improve overnight in the fridge. It can be eaten hot or chilled.
ingredients: 2 medium sweet potatoes, peeled and cubed
2 small apples - peeled, cored, and cubed
2 tablespoons crumbled goat cheese, or to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Mix sweet potatoes, carrots, apples, and onion together in a large baking dish
Drizzle with oil and toss to coat
Stir in curry powder, garlic salt, and pepper
Roast in the preheated oven for 20 minutes
Remove foil and roast until vegetables are tender, another 10 minutes
Remove from the oven and allow to cool, about 10 minutes
Transfer vegetables to a pot and mash or puree with an immersion blender
Stir in milk, ginger, and lemon juice
Bring to a simmer and cook for 20 minutes
Serve warm with crumbled goat cheese
